name: Fēizhōu Tànxiǎn
storyline: In this board game which is similar to Monopoly, players use money to build properties on the spaces they land on, such as farms, quarries or hotels. These will generate more money so the player can then buy supplies to go into the middle of the board and hunt for hidden treasure.
summary: Monopoly: Adventure in Africa for the Super A'can
